message: @ericzanol Groovy

book it! :)
I give it the fourth approval.
Scheduled! And also, I thought it was funny that my auto-correct text replaced "Doctype" with "Foxtrot." So on March 8th, I will be attending Foxtrot Society.
Looks like the P.U.D. building may be out of the choice... no real bandwidth
I'll let this stew on convore for a day or two and then make it official on the meetup site if everyone is ok with that.  Groovy?

Alright folks... @ericzanol and I have been getting some feedback on the format of the talks.  I think there is a fair amount of dialog that we should push the lightning talks up to a max of 15 minutes or so (you aren't forced to go that long) and try to limit the talks to 5 or 6 and have more discussion time after each talk.  I say we try this for March and get a good idea of who wants to talk at next month's meetup about a week in advance (just in case we have to scramble to find replacements)
@jeffboyus I think 15 minutes sounds great. 5 minutes was honestly pretty silly. WHO'S IDEA WAS FIVE MINUTES?! Oh right.
@adambrault 5 min will still work for some of the talks... especially if it's for SASS.. lol ;)
let's encourage the first(?) rule of <!doctype society>, AMIRITE?
@ericzanol That's right!
